The Panama LoCo is looking forward to join together the knowledge of all Ubuntu users and contribute substantially to the development of the Ubuntu project.

=== Key Details ===

* '''Date''' - (''2007-31-07'') - Last Update - (''2008-06-08'')
* '''Team Contact''' - Mario Young <mayeco@ubuntu.com>
* '''Mailing List''' - ubuntu-pa on lists.ubuntu.com
* '''IRC''' - #ubuntu-pa on Freenode
* '''Launchpad''' - https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-pa

=== Roadmap ===

We want to help Ubuntu by:

* Create Translations.
* Helping new people using Ubuntu.
* Share Our Ubuntu CD's
* Helping company using Ubuntu and Free Software.
* Share ''Free'' Software to all our friends.
* Beta Testing new programs to find bugs (KDE4, amaroK, Launchpad, apport, etc...)
